text: Baath, Ba'ath or Ba'th may refer to: ==Politics== *Ba'ath Party *Ba'ath Party (Iraqi-dominated faction) **Arab Socialist Ba'ath Party – Iraq Region *Ba'ath Party (Syrian-dominated faction) **Arab Socialist Ba'ath Party – Syria Region **Arab Socialist Ba'ath Party – Organization of Sudan **Arab Socialist Ba'ath Party – Lebanon Region **Arab Socialist Ba'ath Party – Yemen Region **Libyan Arab Socialist Ba'ath Party *Sudanese Ba'ath Party *Ba'athism *Ba'athist Iraq *De-Ba'athification *Arab Socialist Revolutionary Ba'ath Party *February 1963 Iraqi coup d'état *1963 Syrian coup d'état ==Places== *Baath Dam *Al-Baath Stadium *Al-Baath University ==Other== *Albert Ulrik Bååth *A Flood in Baath Country, a Syrian documentary film
title: Baath
